description:
Part A: Chio-chan and Manana head to school with their popular friend, Yuki.
Part B: Chio-chan tries to tell Manana about an exciting new game.
Part C: Momo thinks back on how she became a member of the disciplinary committee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuki ist es egal / Chio Fisher / Momos Geschichte
Yuki s’en fiche / Chio Fisher / L’histoire de Momo
Yuki-chan Doesn`t Care / Chio Fisher / Momo-chan`s Story
Yuki-chan wa Ki ni Shinai / Chio Fisher / Momo-chan no Ohanashi
雪ちゃんは気にしない / チオ・フィッシャー / 桃ちゃんのおはなし
